# Request an authorization

**Web Endpoint**

Request a user authorization to Account & Organizational Data Sharing apps and web services.

## Using and revoking tokens

- **Revoke tokens**: Invalidate the tokens and associated user authorizations for someone when they are no longer associated with your app.

items.description: Invalidate the tokens and associated user authorizations for someone when they are no longer associated with your app.
items.name: Revoke tokens
